translations: v．闯入，侵入：未经许可或邀请而进入他人领地或事务的行为。
· The neighbors accused him of interloping when he built a fence on their property.
当他在邻居的地产上建築围栏时，邻居指责他闯入。

sentences.sentence: Why that happened is a matter of abiding interest to anthropologically inclined descendants of those interloping moderns.
sentences.translation: 那些贸然闯入者的后代中有些人对人类学很感兴趣，他们一直十分关心尼人灭绝的原因。
